_comment: Example configurations for different operating modes

immediate_mode._behavior: Each BLE advertisement is sent to AWS IoT Core immediately

buffered_mode_no_throttle._description: Buffer messages for 10 seconds, keep ALL records
buffered_mode_no_throttle._behavior: All BLE advertisements buffered, sent every 10s or when buffer reaches 100

buffered_mode_with_throttle._description: Buffer messages for 10 seconds, keep LAST record per device
buffered_mode_with_throttle._behavior: Only last advertisement per device kept, sent every 10s or when 100 unique devices

high_traffic_mode._description: Efficient mode for areas with many BLE devices
high_traffic_mode._behavior: Continuous scanning, send last record per device every 30s, max 50 devices buffered

low_latency_mode._description: Minimize delay, send immediately but throttle per device
low_latency_mode._behavior: Continuous scanning, immediate send, throttle ensures only latest per device

battery_saver_mode._description: Minimize AWS connections and CPU usage
battery_saver_mode._behavior: Continuous scanning, send once per minute, very low power consumption
